description: Identificación de puntos de fallo y síntesis final. Consume outputs validados de todos los niveles inferiores para producir narrativa final.

pdm_sensitivity.description: Meta-analysis is level-agnostic; no PDM adjustments

asymmetry_principle.description: N4 is the terminal level; it cannot be vetoed by lower levels

dependency_rule: N4 consumes validated outputs from N1, N2, and N3
synthesis_role: Constructs final human-readable narrative from filtered evidence graph
